title: How to Make Gluten Free Chocolate Chip Cookies

steps.headline: Combine all of the dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Stir the wet ingredients together in a smaller bowl.
Mix the wet ingredients into the dry.
steps.description: Form a dough by combining everything in the large bowl.

steps.headline: Form ½ inch (1cm) balls and press onto a parchment (baking paper) lined baking sheet.
steps.description: Use an ice cream scoop to make the cookie balls.

steps.headline: Flatten the cookie balls on the pan using your hand.
Bake in the preheated oven for 7-10 minutes.
Remove the cookies from the oven.
steps.description: Allow to cool on a wire cooling rack.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Combine all of the dry ingredients in a large bowl.  Stir the wet ingredients together in a smaller bowl.  Mix the wet ingredients into the dry. Form a dough by combining everything in the large bowl. Form ½ inch (1cm) balls and press onto a parchment (baking paper) lined baking sheet. Use an ice cream scoop to make the cookie balls. Flatten the cookie balls on the pan using your hand.  Bake in the preheated oven for 7-10 minutes.  Remove the cookies from the oven. Allow to cool on a wire cooling rack. Serve.
